## DefaultCrudRepository.includeRelatedModels() method

Returns model instances that include related models of this repository that have a registered resolver.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
protected includeRelatedModels(entities: T[], include?: Inclusion[], options?: Options): Promise<(T & Relations)[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entities | T\[\] | An array of entity instances or data |
|  include | [Inclusion](./repository.inclusion.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Inclusion filter |
|  options | [Options](./repository.options.md) | Options for the operations |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;(T &amp; Relations)\[\]&gt;
